submission:
from collections import defaultdict as dd
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, l: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        d,c={},0
        for i in range(len(l)):
            p=dd(int)
            if l[i]==k:c+=1
            p[l[i]]=1
            for a,b in d.items():
                x=a&l[i]
                if x==k:c+=b
                p[x]+=b
            d=p
        return c
